> Rat Trap had hardly enough time to dart out of the way of Cyclonus's energy blast, when he suddenly catches Lord Elder's transmission, as he jumps to avoid a second hit.

"SRAP!" Scourge said as he realized he had missed his prey! he was
preparing to fire when Cyclonus stepped up and laid a hand on his arm.

"No" Cyclonus said, "I don't think the Predacons would appreciate us
burning down their base."

Scourge almost growled a the back of his throat, "Well what are we
going to do? We can't just let him SIT there!?!" He oriented his gun
at the wall, trying to get a clear shot. "I can hear him talking in
there. he might be getting help."

Cyclonus turned to look at Perceptor, "Do you have anything you could
flood that space with, like coolant? Maybe we can force the Maximal
out into the open."

(TAG)

Preston
(Cyclonus/Scourge)
